articles.description: Veteran legspinner won't play for the Renegades after electing to stay on in South Africa
articles.content:
The Melbourne Renegades have suffered another blow with their premier legspinner Imran Tahir withdrawing from the tournament for personal reasons.

articles.title: Andy Murray was destined for a painful, sad end. Here’s how he pulled off a miraculous comeback - Fox Sports
articles.description: On January 11, 2019, Andy Murray — Sir Andy Murray, no less — delivered one of the most gut-wrenching and iconic interviews in recent tennis history.
articles.content:
Breaking down in tears ahead of the Australian Open, he admitted the tournament might be his last, otherwise he would retire after that years Wimbledon.

articles.title: Former Brisbane Bronco Jamil Hopoate charged after alleged DV incident - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Off-contract NRL player Jamil Hopoate will face court in January following an alleged domestic violence assault in the NSW Mid North Coast.
articles.content:
